## Modeling
### Create a hyperparameter grid 
gridsearch <- expand.grid(
  alpha = 1, # using LASSO
  # NOTE: Use different lambda values
  lambda = seq(0, 1, length.out = 100)  # Vary lambda values
)


### regression formula 
regressionformula <- as.formula("scaled_stepcounts ~ .")


### set up CV
train_control <- trainControl(
  method = "cv",  # Cross-validation method (e.g., k-fold)
  number = 10, #nrow(final_lepadl_smRNA),    # Number of folds
  savePredictions = TRUE,
  allowParallel = FALSE
)

# train_control <- trainControl(
#   method = "cv",  # Cross-validation method (e.g., k-fold)
#   number = 10,    # Number of folds
#   savePredictions = TRUE,
#   allowParallel = FALSE
# )




### set seed 
set.seed(1395571)

### train model 
model <- train(
  regressionformula,
  data = final_sc_smRNA,
  trControl = train_control,
  method = "glmnet",     # Specify the regularization method
  tuneGrid = gridsearch,
  preProcess = NULL      # No preprocessing
)
